trends: There has been one other sighting in Ridley Park
There were no other sightings in Ridley Park on or around April 12th 2012
Summary: Cluster of lights moving at odd varrying speeds
divs: Sighting Detailswe were taking a break at work on he graveyard shift, all of a sudden we all look up and these lights were "dancing" around in the sky. When I ran in to get my camera phone, the phenomena was over.
